A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought the Force Awakens was an anomaly\, in that it was pretty terrible. Rogue One was decent\, so I expected The Last Jedi to be at least as good as Rogue One. I was wrong. The Last Jedi is not only the worst Star Wars movie made (and that includes the terrible prequels)\, but it’s one of the worst movies ever made. I almost walked out of it. I won’t be watching these terrible movies anymore. How sad Disney was able to destroy such a beloved franchise.
